name: Nuke Climate Change!
description:
Nuke The Factories!

Humans are pushing the earth to its limits, you cannot let them ruin this beautiful planet! protect it by force! Nuke all buildings by throwing Comets at em, and protect a bunch of procedurally generated earth's! :D

But hurry up! The rising water levels don't leave you much time..

Make sure to visit the people over ClimateRealityProject at if you want to get involved in the fight against Climate Change!

Music:

Bushwick Tarantella Loop Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
